title: Here and there in Canada
brief_description: Cinemagaazine items including: Octopus Hunt: An energetic skin diver and a tranquilizer bring live octopuses to Vancouver’s public aquarium. Gently Down the Mountain: Mountain rescue techniques and equipment used by R.C.M.P. and park wardens are shown on Mt. Cirrus. Canada’s National Game: Lacrosse, a fast and furious game learned from North American Indians.
